info.name: Inventory Management System
info.description:
##Inventory Management API collection

This collection contains sample requests from localhost

request.description: Displays the available category in the database

response.name: Get Category

request.description: Update the categories in the database
Update specific data from a category
Deletes a specifc category
Displays the products available
Get Specific Product details
Creates new Product
Update specific product data
Update specific data of a Product
Soft deletes a product from the database
Displays the customers available
Creates new Customer using the data provided
Update a customer data
Soft Delete a customer from the database
Display all vendors or display a specific vendor available
Update specific data or all data of vendor in the db
Soft deletes the data of the given id
Updates delivery status to true if it is false
Displays all orders or specific orders available in the db
Create new order
Update an order data
Soft deletes an order from the database
Displays Vendor Specific orders
Displays the available invoices
Creates new Invoice
Display the available payments
Creates new payment
Soft deletes the given payment
Displays the Invoice Specific Payments
##To get all the available organisations

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

response.name: Get Organisation

request.description: ##Create new Organisation
Update the organisations in the database
Deletes a specifc organisation

header.value: GET, PUT, PATCH, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS

Displays the available assets in the database

request.description: Soft deletes the given asset
